name: CrefoPay

infos.name: CrefoPay – Risk, Fraud & Payment für Shopware 6
infos.description:
CREFOPAY - Die Omnichannel-Plattform für digitale Geschäftsprozesse


B2B, B2C oder hybride Kundengruppen? CrefoPay vereinfacht Ihnen und Ihren Kunden die Zahlungsabwicklung auf allen Kanälen und sichert Sie dank Risiko und Forderungsmanagement zusätzlich ab.


CrefoPay unterstützt Ihre Geschäftsprozesse mit modularen Services. Ihr Vorteil: Alle Leistungen stammen aus einer Hand und basieren auf der einzigartigen Datenkompetenz der Creditreform Gruppe. Mit CrefoPay steuern Sie das optimale Verhältnis zwischen Risiko, Kosten und Umsatz ganz individuell selbst.


Das Besondere an CrefoPay ist die integrierte Anbindung an die klassischen Creditreform Services: Individuelles Whitelabel-Mahnwesen, automatisierte Inkassoübergaben und die Rückkopplung zwischen Forderungs und Risikomanagement sind direkt mit enthalten.


Ganz egal ob Sie B2C-, B2B- oder hybride Kundengruppen bedienen: Die CrefoPay-Plattform liefert alle Leistungen über nur einen technischen Zugangsweg.


Ein umsatzstarker Check-out-Prozess ergibt sich aus einer perfekten Usability. Mit CrefoPay ermöglichen Sie reibungslose Prozesse für Ihre Kunden und behalten dabei Ihre Risikovorgaben immer im Blick.

infos.name: CREFOPAY - The omnichannel platform for your digital business processes
infos.description:
CREFOPAY The omnichannel platform for your digital business processes


Regardless of whether you have B2B, B2C or hybrid customer groups – CrefoPay simplifies payment processing for you and your clients over all channels, and gives you additional protection with its integrated risk- and receivables-management functionality.


CrefoPay supports your business processes with modular services, and offers the win-win benefits of all services sourced from a single supplier and the unique data competence of the Creditreform Group. As a further plus point, it lets you tune the balance of risk, costs and revenues yourself, adjusting these optimally to suit your particular needs. 


What makes CrefoPay special is its integrated interfaces to Creditreform’s classic services which include by default: customised white-label dunning, automated case handovers for debt collection, and feedback between receivables and risk management.


Regardless of whether you have B2C, B2B or hybrid customer groups: the CrefoPay platform serves as a single technical interface to all these services.


A high-turnover check-out process results from perfect usability. With CrefoPay, you enable smooth processes for your customers while always keeping an eye on your risk specifications.

changelog.text:
• Shopware 6.5 Compatibility
  • New Express Payment Method: Amazon Pay
• Compatibility for Custom Checkout Checkboxes
• Added new backend controller "updateOpenStateTransactions"

• Extended failure-callback logging
  • Improved PHP8.1 support

• The checkout/CSRF mode of type ajax is now supported
  • Date of birth handling has been improved
  • The customers phone number can be transfered to CrefoPay by plugin option
• Successfully reserved payments will now become payment state "authorized"
• The uncorrect saving of amount values within the refund table has been fixed

• The payment method iDeal is now available
  • Show or hide credit cards for logged in users
  • Updated PHP ClientLibrary to be fully compatible with PHP8.1
• Fixed the amount view in CrefoPay backend tab for decimal precision greater than 2
• Fixed backend links for CrefoPay Merchant Service Area

• Optimization of the PaymentStatusHandler
  • Improvement of the automatical capture funktionality
  • Auto-Capture also works now for order state "Open"

• AcknowledgePending doesn't set payment status "In Progress" anymore
  • Decreased SW compatibility to 6.4+
  • Decreased PHP compatibility to 7.4+
  • Increased PHP compatibility to 8.1
  • Plugin now supports more then 2 decimal places
• Change of the SecureFields sources
• CHARGEBACK notifications now set payment status to reopen
• Optimization of the checkout view for credit card payments
• The plugin now supports notification versions > 2.3
• Custom field for customer groups optimized and improved coupon handling
• Improved handling of incorrect user input in the frontend
• Date of birth is no longer requested in the creditworthiness query for business customers
• HotFix for broken plugin adminstration options
Items of an order that was completed with a CrefoPay payment type can now be edited in the administration again
* Added risk class configuration to customer groups
Fixed an error with shipping free discounts

• Fixed an error with automatic capture on order creation
  • Fixed an error with the path to translation files

• Display disabled transactions accordingly in the order tabs
  • Fixing an error with tax free positions
  • Always activate refund button in capture history for invoice payments

• The automatic capture with shipping status "open" is now possible
  • Added additional dependencies on all AbstractPaymentHandler extended Objects

• Fixing inherited Config-Fields in the "Open transaction" link
  • Update the CrefoPay PHP Library to version 1.2.4
  • Added processing of notifications for partial payments from CrefoPay Merchant Center
  • Change behaviour of Finalize order in the administration

• Fixing incorrect notice in the administration.
  • Fixing an error that occured while changing the order payment status in the administration
  • Fixing an error for new customers viewing payment method in profile right after register.
  • Added compatibility with Shopware v6.4

• Fixing an error that occured during double-clicking on the order submit button
  • Fixing an error with the delivery item tax calculation of the shopping cart
  • Change handling of possible errors in payment process
  • Prevent deletion of plugin critical configuration options in administration
